name: buff-to-int-be
description: Converts a byte buffer to a signed integer use a big-endian encoding. The byte buffer can be up to 16 bytes in length. If there are fewer than 16 bytes, as this function uses a big-endian encoding, the input behaves as if it is zero-padded on the <u>left</u>.
Note: This function is only available starting with Stacks 2.1.
